name: Defeat the Beat
description: Fight the fever in user-created beatmaps against your favorite songs! Can you feel the flow to Defeat the Beat?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
